title: RN-Tech
technologies: React JS, React-router, Firebase Authentication, Private-router, React-hook-form, Material UI, Bootstrap, CSS, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, Heroku, and finally hosted in firebase.
feature1: Mern Stack project which is responsive for mobile and desktop version with a firebase authentication system, also included admin panel, login system, and dashboard functionality for users and admin.
feature2: Users have to sign in by google or email/password system to order any car or other request. Users also can see all orders by his/her.
feature3: Admin Can change dynamically cars item and also manage users order by approve their order status.

title: Tour Dibo
technologies: React js, Firebase Authentication, React-router, React hook form, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Node.js, express.js Heroku and finally hosted in firebase
feature1: Mern stack mobile and desktop responsive with firebase authentication, google login system functionality for users.
feature2: Users can book a tour, update their status from pending to ongoing to do, and can delete his/her booking tour.
feature3: Users must have to sign in to request a service for booking a tour and provide his/her name, email address, mobile number information for booking a tour.

title: Rasel School
technologies: React JS, React-router, Bootstrap, CSS, and hosted in Netlify
feature1: It's a totally front-end focused react application. Rasel School basically a learning platform of many types of courses.

title: Molecular Diagnosis
technologies: React JS, React-router, Firebase authentication, Private route, Context API, Bootstrap, CSS and hosted in firebase.
feature1: Mobile and Desktop Responsive React project of a healthcare diagnosis center with a dynamic routing system.
feature2: Users must have to sign in by google or email-password system to see the service details or can sign up by email and password.
feature3: Molecular Diagnosis is a total frontend focused app with a third party API.
